hymn.title: But to Him who is able to do superabundantly

layout.singingstanza: But to Him who is a -- ble, a -- ble to do su -- per -- a -- bun -- dant -- ly a -- bove all that we ask or think, ac -- cord -- ing to the pow -- er which op -- er -- ates in us, To Him be the glo -- ry in the church and in Christ Je -- sus un -- to all the gen -- er -- a -- tions. To Him be the glo -- ry, to Him be the glo -- ry for -- ev -- er and ev -- er. A -- men.

lyrics.stanza: But to Him who is able Able to do superabundantly Above all that we ask or think, According to the power Which operates in us,
To Him be the glory in the church And in Christ Jesus Unto all the generations. To Him be the glory, To Him be the glory Forever and ever. Amen.
